title: Overcoming a Parents' Divorce
itunes:author: Guest: Elizabeth Oates
itunes:summary:
All of us have baggage from our family of origin. But with God's help, we can overcome a painful past. John and Danny give hope to those who come from a divorced family.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Elizabeth Oates' book "Mending Broken Branches" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-27?refcd=1120102

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/overcoming-a-parents-divorce/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
